author: sky.cactus
content: You leak a *tiny* bit every missed slots.  The more often you miss, the more you leak with each miss.  I don't know the formal so I don't know how on/off would affect the leak rate compared to consistently off.  I *suspect* it is more acceptable to flicker on/off because at even in the worst case, at least the chain is likely still finalizing (just less regularly).
